abstract: Federal Reserve's Federal Open Market Committee is increasingly divided between advocates for stronger steps to bolster economy and dissenters who see little benefit and considerable risk in such efforts.
snippet: The Federal Open Market Committee is increasingly divided between advocates for stronger steps to boost the economy and dissenters who see risks in such efforts.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Open Market Committee is increasingly divided between advocates for stronger steps to boost the economy and dissenters who see risks in such efforts.

headline.main: Divisions Grow on Federal Reserve’s Policy Committee
headline.print_headline: Conflict and Confusion Over Economy at the Fed
headline.seo: Fed Committee Even More Divided, Minutes Show
